thread.title: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish
thread.title_full: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish

title: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish
text:
> Top News Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton of Britain celebrates on the podium flanked by Russian President Vlaimir Putin after winning the Formula One Russian Grand Prix at the Sochi Autodrom, in Sochi, Russia, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (AP Photo/Luca Bruno) Search Help
